name: Real Infinite Fly Submarine Dive Simulator
name_original: Real Infinite Fly Submarine Dive Simulator
description:
Submarine Dive is a fun free game where skill and eye-hand

coordination are essential. The player controls his submarine using

the tap to screen and advances through levels,exploring the depths of

the sea, collecting as many items as possible, getting as far as

possible. Smashing against the sand, or weeds will result in loss of a

life. Do that 3 times and your submarine will be sunk resulting in the

loss of the game session.Its look like flying in the sea.


Submarine Simulator - Discover a high-quality, huge underwater world

populated by different kinds of sea animals like octopus, squids or

other fishes and other marine item. Control an exploratory submarine /

u-boat though the realistic underwater terrain. The underwater world

is not limited. It enlarges the more your explore with the submarine

the ocean, randomly. You don't know what kind of Bio me appears next.

This is your chance to become to a submarine captain and look for lost

treasure underwater in the deep blue sea , your submarine is equipped

with sensors to detect and retrieve the treasures from the bottom of

the sea along with the sunken ships and the lost precious treasures

hidden within them , your mission is to dive into a treasure hunt like

no other , as you control your submarine through the sea , avoid

hitting the bottom of the sea and at the same time .



If you like diving with an awesome submarine and going treasure

hunting , you will love this game , as it offers you a lot of levels

and a lot of treasures to be found , you only have to find them and

pick them intact and make sure to make the delivery without damaging

your submarine , do not wonder off to the depth of the sea though ,

you will lose control of your submarine as it sinks to the bottom .

this submarine is designed for medium depth treasure hunting , and

should not be used for more depths.

Game Features :
-HOLD screen to propel upwards
-Release to fall downwards
-Avoid the obstacles
-Collect coins and get power-ups. Complete missions to earn

extra coins.
-Unlock all the submarines.
-Huge underwater terrain
-Realistic graphic
-Different Bi oms(Deep Sea, Coral Reef, Sand)
-Diver simulator
-Great submarine controls
-Awesome underwater environment.
-Over 20 challenges of treasure hunting.
-Easy to control , hard to master.
